pageContext.claim: “Tariffs are the greatest! Either a country which has treated the United States unfairly on Trade negotiates a fair deal, or it gets hit with Tariffs. It’s as simple as that - and everybody’s talking! Remember, we are the 'piggy bank' that’s being robbed. All will be Great!”
pageContext.analysis: Tariffs cause winners and losers, and already some companies in the United States have had to lay off workers. Trump misunderstands the impact of trade deficits; the United States was not a "piggy bank" being robbed but benefited from rising trade with other countries.
